timeline.Title: Mozambique Independence
timeline.Text: At independence from Portugal in 1975, the country became a one-party Marxist-Leninist state.

timeline.Text: In 1990, the country adopted a new constitution, marking the beginning of a democratic climate that led the country to its first multiparty elections (in 1994).
